titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: CEMENT REMOVAL INDICATOR (FEMORAL) - Description

body.p: CEMENT REMOVAL INDICATOR (FEMORAL) is the same as attribute CEMENT REMOVAL INDICATOR FOR JOINT REPLACEMENT to indicate if the cement used in the Primary Hip Replacement Surgery , for fixing the femoral components to the femur, is removed before new femoral implants are inserted during the Revision Hip Replacement Surgery .
